overview: Liang Yi Fan heads to Chiang Mai to look for a venue to hold a memorial concert for Deng Li Jun. He meets Mice who aids him when he is in need of assistance. Mice guides him around the city. There is a connection between the two, but Yi Fan's ex-girlfriend shows up just as they were getting close. Then, COVID halts Yi Fan's plans, and he has to say goodbye to Mice.
title: Only Love You, Mice
